name: Dear Teacher
description:
Your dream has come true. You are finally living in Korea and teaching English classes in Seoul. However; you know nothing about Korea except what you have seen in k-dramas, k-pop, and others that have moved to Korea to teach English. How much will your life change? Can you adapt? Is there anybody willing to help you along?

(Note: If you don't like Korean men then this game isn't for you.)

This is my very first visual novel. 

All bgs and sprites currently used are just place holder. I do have plans on getting commissioned art and voice actors for Dear Teacher once I have the funding.

Update 2/16/18: Sprites and more scenes added.  Up next will you will be the filling of a hot boner sandwich.
Update: 2/17/18: Demo is done and in time for Strawberry Jam.

Working on the full game right now.
